title.narrative: Sub-contractors for the Sustainable Urban Economic Development Programme in Kenya

description.narrative: This activity (Sub-contractors for the Sustainable Urban Economic Development Programme in Kenya) is a component of Sustainable Urban Economic Development Programme (SUED) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £15,926,001. This component benefits Kenya, and works in the following sector(s): Urban development and management. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development. The start date is 28-03-2014 and the end date is 30-09-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
